explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine-learning models to analyze stock market anomalies and their performance.
explanations.neural network: The paper specifically refers to feed-forward neural networks as one of the models with the highest return predictability.
explanations.deep learning: The use of neural networks and composite predictors suggests an application of deep learning techniques.
explanations.feature learning: The paper discusses the use of elastic net as a feature reduction method, indicating a focus on feature learning.
explanations.feature representation: The mention of feature reduction and composite predictors implies a consideration of how features are represented in the models.
explanations.representation learning: The use of composite predictors and neural networks suggests an emphasis on learning representations from data.
